mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT count(1) FROM weiit_user WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} ) user_total, ( SELECT sum(pay_price) FROM weiit_order WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND (state != 0 AND state !=- 1) ) sale_total, ( SELECT count(1) FROM weiit_order WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND (state != 0 AND state !=- 1) ) order_total, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM weiit_order WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND (state != 0 AND state !=- 1) AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') )current_month_deal FROM DUAL
SELECT MONTH (create_time) month, count(1) sale_total FROM weiit_user WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND YEAR (create_time) = YEAR (now()) GROUP BY MONTH (create_time)
SELECT MONTH (create_time) month, sum(pay_price) sale_total FROM weiit_order_item WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND YEAR (create_time) = YEAR (now()) GROUP BY MONTH (create_time)

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.sale_count, temp.true_sale_total FROM weiit_product p INNER JOIN ( SELECT product_id, count(1) AS true_sale_total, d.shop_id FROM weiit_order_item d LEFT JOIN weiit_order o ON (d.order_id = o.order_id) WHERE (o.state != 0 OR o.state !=- 1) GROUP BY product_id,d.shop_id ) temp ON ( p.product_id = temp.product_id )
and temp.shop_id=#{shop_id}

SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, sum(temp.pay_price) sale_total FROM ( SELECT d.shop_id, d.pay_price FROM weiit_order_item d LEFT JOIN weiit_order o ON (d.order_id = o.order_id) WHERE (o.state != 0 OR o.state !=- 1) GROUP BY product_id ) temp LEFT JOIN weiit_shop s ON (temp.shop_id = s.shop_id) GROUP BY temp.shop_id ORDER BY sale_total DESC

select cate_id_level1 cate_id, (select cate_name from weiit_init_product_cate where cate_id=p.cate_id_level1) cate_name, count(1) sale_total from ( select d.product_id, d.product_name from weiit_order_item d left join weiit_order o on (d.order_id=o.order_id) where (o.state!=0 or o.state!=-1) ) temp inner join weiit_product p on (temp.product_id=p.product_id) group by p.cate_id_level1
